title: Escape
description: With a terrifying shriek, the parasite attempts to flee at a speed of 10 feet/round. It will search for a difficult-to-access place and hide there until it matures into its adult form (D10 Time Tracks). Then it will be ready to start stalking the characters.

title: Leg Bite
description: With a snarl, the parasite attacks the nearest character’s leg (Attack Skill 8, D10+5 damage).

title: Leg Bite
description: With a snarl, the parasite attacks the nearest character’s leg (Attack Skill 8, D10+5 damage).

title: Face Attack
description: The creature jumps to attach itself to the closest character’s face (Attack Skill 8, D10+5 damage).
